tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tourist_experience (
  experience_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  experience_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY(feedback_id) REFERENCES customer_feedback(feedback_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tourism_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    feedback_id INT,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    service_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    booking_date DATE
);
